```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(naniar)
library("ggthemes")
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```


```{r}
new_table <- inner_join(candidates, contributions, by= "cand_id")
new_table
```


```{r}
MP2_table <- inner_join(new_table, committees, by= "cand_id") %>%
  select(cand_id, cand_name, cand_party_affiliation, cand_state, cmte_name, cmte_state, connected_org_name)
```


```{r}
new_house <- house_elections %>%
  select(fec_id, state,  incumbent, party, primary_votes) %>%
  rename(cand_id= "fec_id")
new_house 
```


```{r}
new_table <- inner_join(MP2_table, new_house, by= "cand_id") %>%
  group_by(cand_name)
new_table
```


```{r}
contributions <- contributions %>%
  select(cmte_id, name, state, cand_id, transaction_amt, transaction_type) %>%
  filter(transaction_type== "24E")
contributions
```


```{r}
committees %>%
  select(cmte_id, cmte_name, cmte_state, cand_id) 
committees
```


```{r}
candidates <- candidates %>%
  select(cand_id, cand_name, cand_party_affiliation, cand_office)
candidates
```


```{r}
joined_dataset <- inner_join(committees, candidates, by= "cand_id")
joined_dataset
```


```{r}
j2_dataset <- inner_join(new_house, joined_dataset, by= "cand_id")
j2_dataset
```


```{r}
j3_dataset <- inner_join(j2_dataset, contributions, by= "cand_id")  %>%
  rename("cmte_id"= cmte_id.x)
j3_dataset_total <- j3_dataset %>%
 select(cand_id, state.x, incumbent, party, cmte_id, cmte_name, cmte_party_affiliation, cand_party_affiliation, cand_office, state.y, transaction_amt) %>%
  group_by(cand_id) %>%
summarize(total_contributions= sum(transaction_amt)) 
j3_dataset_total
```


```{r}
j3_dataset_state <- j3_dataset %>%
  select(state.x, cand_id, transaction_amt) %>%
  group_by(state.x) %>%
  mutate(state.contribution= sum(transaction_amt)) 
j3_dataset_state
```


```{r}
j3_dataset_final <- inner_join(j3_dataset_total, j3_dataset_state, by= "cand_id") %>%
  select(-transaction_amt)
j3_dataset_final %>%
  group_by(cand_id) %>%
  mutate(percentage_contrib= (total_contributions/state.contribution)*100) %>%
  arrange((percentage_contrib))
 j3_dataset_final
```
  
  TOP 10 states: CA, FL, AZ, PA, IL, NC, TX, NY, AZ, UT
  

```{r}
j3_finaldataset <- inner_join(j3_dataset_total, j3_dataset_final, by=  "cand_id") %>%
  select(-total_contributions.y) %>%
  rename("total_contributions"= total_contributions.x)
j3_finaldataset
```

```{r}
final_dataset <- inner_join(j2_dataset, j3_dataset_final, by= "cand_id") %>%
  select(cand_id, state, incumbent, party, cand_office, cmte_id) 
final_dataset
```

```{r}
final_dataset2  <- final_dataset %>%
  select(cand_id, state, incumbent, party, cmte_id, cand_office) %>%
  group_by(cand_id) %>%
 summarize(number_com=  n_distinct(cmte_id))
final_dataset2
```

```{r}
final_dataset3 <- inner_join(final_dataset, final_dataset2, by= "cand_id")
final_dataset3
```

```{r}
final_dataset_new <- final_dataset2 %>%
  inner_join(j3_finaldataset, by = "cand_id") %>%
  inner_join(new_house, by = "cand_id") 
final_dataset_new
```

```{r}
final_dataset_new <- final_dataset_new %>% 
  mutate(log_tc= log(total_contributions)) %>%
  filter(state == "CA")
final_dataset_new
```

```{r}
final_dataset_new %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = number_com, y = log_tc, color = incumbent, size = primary_votes)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_jitter() +
  labs(x= "Number of Committees in the State", 
       y= "Total Contributions (log)", 
       size= "Primary Votes", 
       color= "Incumbent Status", 
       title = "Breakdown by Incumbent Status") + theme_hc() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("TRUE" = "#B833FF", "FALSE" = "#77FF33"))
```

```{r}
final_dataset_new %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = number_com, y = log_tc, color = party, size = primary_votes)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_jitter() +
  labs(x= "Number of Committees in the State", 
       y= "Total Contributions", 
       color= "Party Type", 
       size= "Primary Votes", 
       title = "Breakdown by Party Type") + theme_hc() +
  scale_colour_manual(values = c("D" = "#04417A", "R" = "#E22E2F"))
```
